DOC.brief_summary: Eight-week multi-national , multicenter , randomize , double blind , active control , two arm , parallel group study 4-week single drug treatment ( manidipine amlodipine ) phase follow 4-week combination treatment ( manidipine + delapril amlodipine + delapril ) phase .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effects Manidipine Versus Amlodipine Combination Manidipine Plus Delapril Versus Amlodipine Plus Delapril Intraglomerular Pressure Hypertensive Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The aim current study assess effect 4-week single drug treatment manidipine amlodipine 4-week combination treatment manidipine plus delapril amlodipine plus delapril intraglomerular pressure subject hypertension .
DOC.criteria: male female patient age 18 year old mild moderate hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 139 mmHg diastolic blood pressure > 89 mmHg ) secondary form arterial hypertension severe hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 179 mmHg diastolic blood pressure > 109 mmHg ) pregnant lactate woman
